attributes.action: Stop trading in and/or providing weapons and armaments to Saudi Arabia.
attributes.additional_details:
The government has been put on notice that it is in breach of international law for allowing the export of British-made missiles and military equipment to Saudi Arabia that might have been used to kill civilians.
http://www.theguardian.com/world/2016/jan/09/saudi-arms-sales-lawyers-warn-break-international-law-yemen
attributes.background: Saudi Arabia is using weapons and armaments made and sold by British companies (E.G. BAe Systems) to bomb hospitals, children's schools, residential homes and other none military targets in Yemen.
